channel.title: Appetizers on Chef Frank's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Appetizers on Chef Frank's Recipes

item.title: Authentic Steak Quesadilla Recipe
item.description: Steak Quesadillas a Great Quick Mexican Quesadilla Recipe using Fresh Sirloin Steak and Soft Tortillas. Make Fresh Salsa and Guacamole if you Desire from our Quick Mexican Recipes. Quesadillas are Served for Lunch or Supper. Steak Quesadillas Recipe 2-3 lbs Sirloin Steak cut in strips 1 c salsa 1 pkg fajita seasoning 2 c shredded cheddar 8 12″ flour tortillas Steak Quesadilla Toppings sliced onions and peppers (optional) sliced black olives 1 c sour cream 1/2 c jalapeno peppers 2 c shredded lettuce 2 c diced tomatoes 2 c refried beans 1 c guacamole Directions In large frying pan, brown steak until cooked then add 2 tbsp salsa and fajita seasoning to taste.

item.title: Bacon Wrapped Pineapple
item.description: Bacon Wrapped Pineapple makes an Excellent Appetizer for Parties and Get Togethers. Serve for Holidays and Special events. In our family it was a traditional appetizer for Christmas or New Years. We loved to make it because it was often requested by friends and loved ones. It also goes well with any beverage or cocktail. It also goes well with our honey baked ham. Bacon Wrapped Pineapple 1 fresh pineapple Cut into wedges 1 lb thick cut bacon, cut in half round toothpicks Bacon Wrapped Pineapple Directions Wrap bacon around Pineapple.

item.title: Bacon Wrapped Steak
item.description: Quick Bacon Wrapped Steak Recipe is a great Appetizer for parties. Bacon Wrapped Steak dipped in Seafood Sauce is nice on your New Year’s Eve Party. Bacon Wrapped Steak serves 15 2 lb steak, cut in 1″ squares 1 lb bacon, cut strips in 1/2 toothpicks deep frying kettle with oil Bacon Wrapped Steak Directions Wrap bacon around steak and secure with a toothpick. Deep fry at 350℉ for 3-5 minutes or until desired doneness is achieved.

item.title: Puff Pastry Wrap Recipe
item.description: Quick Puff Pastry Wraps Recipes are great for Appetizers or Desserts. Simple instructions on how to make Puff Pastry Wraps for any Holiday or Party. Happy New Year Appetizers. Puff Pastry Wrap Ingredients Puff pastry sheets can be purchased at any commercial food store. 1 sheet puff pastry dough(makes about 12 servings or so) 12 mini smoked sausages leftover mashed potatoes 1 c shredded cheese 1/2 c fresh chopped chives bowl water and pastry brush( this acts as the glue to make pastry stick together).

item.title: Seafood Sauce Recipe
item.description: Festive Holiday Seafood Sauce Recipe is made from ketchup, lemon, and horse radish. Easy to prepare and is best with Shrimp Cocktail or Fried Shrimp, Clams or Fish. Seafood Sauce is a must. Seafood Sauce Ingredients 2 c ketchup 1-2 tbsp horseradish 2 tbsp lemon juice Directions In mixing bowl combine ingredients together, cover refrigerate. Note: This sauce is good with shrimp, scallops, fish , and Bacon Wrapped Steak

item.title: Hot Mustard Sauce Recipe
item.description: Quick Hot Mustard Sauce Recipe is a favorite at parties for dipping egg rolls, wings, or other puff pastry appetizers. Hot mustard on warm pretzels is comforting and satisfying. Hot Mustard Sauce Recipe 1/2 c dry mustard 1 tsp sugar 1/4 tsp salt 1 tbsp butter, melted 1 tsp vinegar 1/2 c boiling water(only use enough to make thick sauce) Directions Mix ingredients together. Add boiling water to make thick sauce.

item.title: Easy Drawn Butter – Clarified Butter Recipe
item.description: Drawn butter, or some call it clarified butter, is used over broiled fish, lobster, and many different seafood entrees whether on the grill or under a broiler. Drawn Butter 1/2 lb butter Directions Melt butter in small sauce pan very slowly. do not stir or boil. Whan butter has melted, skim away salt layer on top. Than ladle the clear hot butter into a small “drawn butter cup”, or a small custard dish does well.

item.title: Orange Gelatin Salad Recipe
item.description: Quick Orange Gelatin Salad is a special Holiday Treat at the end of a great meal. Orange Gelatin Salad has pineapple, manderin oranges and whipped cream. A wonderful dessert. Holiday Orange Gelatin 1 small pkg orange gelatin 1 c orange pop 1 c hot water 120℉(to dissolve gelatin) 1 pkg dry whip cream mix 1 can drained pineapple 1 can drained mandarin oranges Directions Mix gelatin and hot water, then add pop.

item.title: Festive Holiday Cheese Balls
item.description: Quick Cheese Balls Recipe is for the Holidays with crackers and other Appetizers. Cheese Balls take 15 minutes to prepare, and are eye appealing too! Cheese Ball Recipe 2 8oz. cream cheese 1lb brick cheddar cheese (shredded) 1 med onion finely chopped 3 tsp worcestershire sauce 1-2 tsp milk 1 tsp garlic (fresh or granulated) 1/2 c chopped nuts (pecans) Cheese Ball Directions Mix all ingredients together. Form two balls evenly then roll in nuts.

item.title: Buffalo Style Hot Wings Recipe
item.description: Buffalo Style Hot Wings Make a Great Appetizer. Serve at birthday parties, Holiday gatherings or any social event. Hot Wings Recipe 5# wings 4 oz butter 1 1/2 c hot sauce Buffalo Style Hot Wings Directions Cut wings at joint, throw end tip away. Deep fry in 2 qt oil at 350℉ for ten minutes. You may have to fry 4 batches. Melt butter in sauce pan, add hot sauce and whisk together.

item.title: Fresh Mexican Salsa Recipe
item.description: Quick Mexican Salsa Recipe is made from Fresh Peppers, Tomatoes, Onions, and Spices. Use Mexican Salsa for any Mexican Recipe as a Topper or Dip. Salsa Ingedients 1 diced onion 2 diced green pepper 6 diced tomatoes (fresh) 2 rib celery small diced 3 cups tomato juice hot sauce to taste 1 tbsp chili powder 1/2 c sliced jalapeno (optional) Salsa Direction In small sauce pan, bring tomato juice to boil.

item.title: Mexican Seven Layer Dip Recipe
item.description: Great Filling Snack for Parties. Mexican Seven (7) Layer Dip with Refried Beans, Cream Cheese, Fresh Vegetables Cheese, and Salsa. Quick and Easy to make in about 10 minutes. Tortilla Chips Love Taking a Dip! Mexican Seven Layer Dip Recipe 2 cans refried beans 1 pkg taco or burrito seasoning 8-12 oz. salsa 1 lb sour cream 8 oz. cream cheese 1 small can black olives, sliced, drained 1 fresh freen papper, diced 1 small sweet or red onion, diced 3 medium tomatoes, diced 1/2 c.

item.title: Scratch Guacamole Recipe
item.description: Scratch Mexican Guacamole is a favorite with Nachos, burritos, tacosand quesadillas. Oh, and fajitastoo. It’s simple to prepare with fresh avocados, real lemon juice, garlic and spices. If you make too much, it’s easy to freeze until your next Mexican meal. Mexican Guacamole Recipe serves 6-10 2 avocados, peeled, mashed 2 tsp lemon juice 1/2 tsp salt 3 tbsp minced onion 1 tsp chopped garlic 1/3 c tomato , finely chopped Directions Mix all ingredients together, chill.

item.title: Mexican Quesadilla Recipe
item.description: Chicken Quesadillas – a Great Quick Mexican Quesadilla Recipe using Fresh Chicken Breasts and Soft Tortillas. Make Fresh Salsa and Guacamole if you Desire from our Quick Easy Mexican Recipes. Quesadillas are Served for Lunch or Supper. Chicken Quesadillas Recipe 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts cut in strips 1 c salsa 1 pkg fajita seasoning 2 c shredded cheddar 8 12″ flour tortillas Toppings sliced onions and peppers (optional) sliced black olives 1 c sour cream 1/2 c jalapeno peppers 2 c shreeded lettuce 2 c diced tomatoes 2 c refried beans 1 c guacamole Directions In large frying pan, brown chicken until cooked then add 2 tbsp salsa and fajita seasoning to taste.

item.title: Mexican Cheese Dip
item.description: Mexican Cheese Dip with ground beef, is an easy appetizerfor dipping crackers, nacho chips, and tortilla chips. This Dip is a great party staple to go with your other appetizers or for an after school snack for the kids. Mexican Cheese Dip Recipe 1 lb soft pasteurized American cheese 1/2 c milk 1 lb ground beef, browned, drained (optional) 1/2 onion diced, sauteed 1 tbsp taco seasoning 1/2 tbsp ground cumin pepper to taste Directions In large microwaveable bowl, place cheese and milk, heat for 1 minute then stir, heat again and stir add onions and seasonings and ground beef if desired.

item.title: Focaccia Pizza, Vegetarian Pita Bread and Fresh Mozzarella
item.description: Vegetarians will be Excited with this Pita Facaccia Pizza. Fresh Mozzarella, Basil, Vegetables, and Homemade Pesto is a Quick Lunch or Dinner. Top off with any salad or fruit. Focaccia Pizza on Pita with Fresh Mozzarella and Pesto one pita per serving pita bread sliced 1/2″ fresh mozzarella 3 roasted garlic cloves 2 oz. fresh basil 1/2 c olive oil 4 oz. tomato sauce thin sliced fresh tomatoes thin sliced green or colored peppers thin sliced sweet onion Pesto Directions To make pesto: Combine olive oil, garlic and basil in food prossesor and chop until incorporated together.

item.title: Bacon Wrapped Olives Appetizer
item.description: Quick Bacon Wrapped Olives Make a great Appetizer for parties and get togethers. Bacon Wrapped Olives are festive too, and make a great Christmas or New Years Eve Snack. Bacon Wrapped Olives Ingredients 1 jar olives (stuffed with pimento) regular size 1 lb bacon cut in 1/2 (thick bacon works best) round toothpicks Bacon Wrapped Olives Directions Wrap bacon around olives. skewer with toothpick. Place on cookie sheet. bake 375℉ 12-15 minutes or until desired doneness.
